summary: Completed frontend testing of Ocean E-commerce marketplace. Major bugs from iteration_4 have been fixed - products are now displaying correctly and registration form works. However, frontend login flow has a critical issue preventing user authentication.

ui_bugs.issue: Login form submission not redirecting to homepage after successful authentication
ui_bugs.details: Backend API returns valid token but frontend stays on login page instead of redirecting to homepage

integration_issues.issue: Cannot test authenticated features (cart, wishlist) due to login redirect failure

passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with hero section and navigation
Products page displays 12 products (not 'No products found' - BUG FIXED)
Registration page loads with correct form fields and account type selection
Product detail pages load with correct product information
Cart and wishlist pages are accessible
Backend login API works correctly (returns valid JWT token)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend login redirect issue - backend authentication works but frontend login form doesn't redirect to homepage after successful login. Check JavaScript console errors and login form submission handling in LoginPage.js

success_percentage.frontend: 75% - Major bugs fixed but login redirect issue remains
